sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker</description>
        <name>AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker = Class.create();
AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
   updateData: function() {
      var itemID = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_id');
      var table = this.getTableName();
      var result = "";
      if (itemID != "" && table != null){
         var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
         gr.addQuery('sys_id', itemID);
         gr.query();
         if (gr.next()){
            var values = this.getNewValues(itemID, gr.state);
            if (values){
               gr.state = values[0];
               gr.blocked = values[1];
               gr.blocked_reason = values[2];
               gr.update();
               result = values.join("|");
            }
         }
      }
      return result;
   },

   whatWillChange: function() {
      var itemID = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_id');
      var table = this.getTableName();
      var result = [];
      if (itemID != "" && table != null){
         var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
         gr.addQuery('sys_id', itemID);
         gr.query();
         if (gr.next()){
            var values = this.getNewValues(itemID, gr.state);
            if (values){
               result = this.getChangeMessages(gr, values);
            }
         }
      }
      return result.join("|");
   },

   getChangeMessages: function(){
      return [];
   },

   getNewValues: function(){
      return null;
   },

   getTableName: function(){
      return null;
   },
	
	/**
	 * Prevent public access to this processor
	 */
	isPublic: function() {
		return false;
	}
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2011-08-15 09:46:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>31fdf1b037201000dadaa3549dbe5d7e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AbstractAjaxDataUpdateChecker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development" source="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp">4e159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_31fdf1b037201000dadaa3549dbe5d7e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-06-25 12:04:16</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1606</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
